Title: Enter the Dragon
Notes: Bruce Lee 's final screen appearance before his death

Title: The Karate Kid
Notes: Retired karate master Mr. Miyagi ( Pat Morita ) instructs a newcomer ( Ralph Macchio )

Title: No Retreat , No Surrender
Notes: A Seattle boy ends up fighting a Russian martial-arts star ( Jean-Claude Van Damme )

Title: Bloodsport
Notes: Frank Dux ( played by Van Damme ) , a Canadian , enters a competition in Hong Kong

Title: Best of the Best
Notes: Americans take on Koreans in a tae kwon do tournament . Eric Roberts stars

Title: Kickboxer
Notes: An American and his brother end up in a life-or-death competition in Asia

Title: Sidekicks
Notes: A boy with asthma fantasizes about being taught by Chuck Norris , and gets to compete alongside him in a tournament

Title: 3 Ninjas
Notes: Three boys learn Ninjutsu from their Japanese grandfather

Title: Only the Strong
Notes: An ex- Green Beret uses martial arts against Miami drug dealers

Title: The Next Karate Kid
Notes: Another sequel , this time with a girl ( Hilary Swank ) as Mr. Miyagi 's apt pupil

Title: Street Fighter II : The Animated Movie
